Name: Trabajadores El Zungano Group
description:
Rosibel is 29 years old and cultivates basic staple crops for a living. She started working the land with the help of her parents. Rosibel is requesting a Kiva loan from FUNDENUSE to buy farming supplies so that she can maintain her corn and bean crops. Her goals are to make improvements to her home and have a better quality of life.

Rosibel is a member of the solidarity group “Trabajadores El Zungano” along with Maricela, José, and Jacarelis, who also work in agriculture.
